description: Business associate may only use or disclose PHI for purposes specified in contract or as required by law
permitted_uses: Services specified in contract, legal compliance
prohibited_uses: Uses beyond contract scope, selling PHI, marketing

description: Business associate must implement administrative technical and physical safeguards to protect PHI
permitted_uses: Implementing HIPAA Security Rule requirements, workforce training, security policies

description: Business associate must notify covered entity immediately upon discovery of breach of PHI
permitted_uses: Timely notification of breach, forensic analysis, remediation efforts
prohibited_uses: Delayed notification, hiding breaches, inadequate investigation

description: Business associate is responsible for subcontractors and must ensure they meet same HIPAA obligations
permitted_uses: Extending BAA terms to subcontractors, oversight, training

description: Business associate must provide covered entity with ability to access and amend PHI in systems
permitted_uses: Facilitating individual access requests, supporting amendments, providing copies
prohibited_uses: Denying access, altering records, withholding information

description: Business associate must maintain and make available accounting of disclosures of PHI
permitted_uses: Tracking disclosures, maintaining logs, supporting covered entity compliance
prohibited_uses: Failing to track disclosures, inadequate documentation

description: Business associate must return or destroy PHI upon termination of contract
permitted_uses: Secure return of original data, certified destruction, retention only if required by law
prohibited_uses: Retaining PHI after contract termination, improper disposal

description: Covered entity has right to audit and inspect business associate's safeguards and systems
permitted_uses: Permitting covered entity audits, providing evidence of compliance, cooperating fully
prohibited_uses: Refusing audits, hiding inadequate systems, obstructing inspections

description: Contract must include mechanisms for termination and cure of breaches
permitted_uses: Allowing remediation period, providing cure opportunity, terminating for uncured violations
prohibited_uses: Immediate termination without cure opportunity, excessive remediation timelines

description: Business associate must not retaliate against employees reporting HIPAA violations
permitted_uses: Protecting reporting employees, investigating complaints, taking corrective action
prohibited_uses: Retaliating against whistleblowers, suppressing reports, punishing reporters
